commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
{
  "name": "@sysvale/cuida",
  "version": "2.52.2",
  "description": "A design system built by Sysvale, using storybook and Vue components",
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "https://github.com/Sysvale/cuida"
  },
  "main": "dist/@sysvale/cuida.ssr.js",
  "module": "dist/@sysvale/cuida.esm.js",
  "unpkg": "dist/@sysvale/cuida.min.js",
  "files": [
    "dist/*"
  ],
  "scripts": {
    "serve": "vue-cli-service serve",
    "test:unit": "vue-cli-service test:unit",
    "test": "jest",
    "lint": "vue-cli-service lint",
    "storybook": "start-storybook -p 6006 --docs",
    "build-storybook": "build-storybook -s public --docs",
    "build": "cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup --config build/rollup.config.js",
    "build:ssr": "cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup --config build/rollup.config.js --format cjs",
    "build:es": "cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup --config build/rollup.config.js --format es",
    "build:unpkg": "cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup --config build/rollup.config.js --format iife",
    "chromatic": "npx chromatic --project-token=a0f13ffc7d61"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@sysvale/cuida-icons": "^1.4.0",
    "bootstrap": "^4.5.2",
    "bootstrap-vue": "^2.17.1",
    "concat": "^1.0.3",
    "core-js": "^3.6.5",
    "flush-promises": "^1.0.2",
    "ionicons": "^5.5.0",
    "luxon": "^3.0.4",
    "material-design-icons": "^3.0.1",
    "moment": "^2.29.1",
    "v-calendar": "^2.2.3",
    "vue": "^2.6.12",
    "vue-feather-icons": "^5.1.0",
    "vue-long-click": "0.0.4",
    "vue-multiselect": "^2.1.6",
    "vue-on-click-outside": "^1.0.3",
    "vue-slider-component": "^3.2.11"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/core": "^7.11.6",
    "@rollup/plugin-alias": "^2.2.0",
    "@rollup/plugin-buble": "^0.20.0",
    "@rollup/plugin-replace": "^2.3.0",
    "@storybook/addon-actions": "^6.5.9",
    "@storybook/addon-essentials": "^6.5.9",
    "@storybook/addon-links": "^6.5.9",
    "@storybook/preset-scss": "^1.0.3",
    "@storybook/vue": "^6.5.9",
    "@vue/cli-plugin-babel": "~4.5.0",
    "@vue/cli-plugin-eslint": "~4.5.0",
    "@vue/cli-plugin-unit-jest": "~4.5.0",
    "@vue/cli-service": "~4.5.0",
    "@vue/eslint-config-airbnb": "^5.0.2",
    "@vue/test-utils": "^1.1.0",
    "babel-eslint": "^10.1.0",
    "babel-loader": "^8.1.0",
    "chromatic": "^6.0.4",
    "cross-env": "^6.0.3",
    "css-loader": "^4.3.0",
    "eslint": "^6.7.2",
    "eslint-config-prettier": "^8.5.0",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "^2.20.2",
    "eslint-plugin-prettier": "^4.2.1",
    "eslint-plugin-vue": "^6.2.2",
    "highlight.js": "^10.6.0",
    "node-sass": "^4.12.0",
    "prettier": "^2.7.1",
    "react-is": "^16.13.1",
    "rollup": "^1.29.0",
    "rollup-plugin-commonjs": "^10.1.0",
    "rollup-plugin-terser": "^5.2.0",
    "rollup-plugin-vue": "5.1.1",
    "sass-loader": "^8.0.2",
    "style-loader": "^1.2.1",
    "vue-hljs": "^2.0.0",
    "vue-template-compiler": "^2.6.11"
  },
  "prettier": {
    "semi": true,
    "singleQuote": true,
    "tabWidth": 4,
    "useTabs": true,
    "vueIndentScriptAndStyle": true
  },
  "eslintConfig": {
    "root": true,
    "env": {
      "node": true
    },
    "extends": [
      "plugin:vue/essential",
      "plugin:prettier/recommended",
      "@vue/airbnb"
    ],
    "parserOptions": {
      "parser": "babel-eslint"
    },
    "plugins": [
      "prettier"
    ],
    "rules": {
      "vue/html-indent": [
        "error",
        "tab",
        {
          "attribute": 1,
          "closeBracket": 0,
          "alignAttributesVertically": true,
          "ignores": []
        }
      ],
      "prettier/prettier": "error",
      "no-tabs": "off",
      "indent": [
        "error",
        "tab",
        {
          "SwitchCase": 1
        }
      ],
      "quotes": [
        "error",
        "single",
        {
          "allowTemplateLiterals": true
        }
      ]
    },
    "overrides": [
      {
        "files": [
          "**/__tests__/*.{j,t}s?(x)",
          "**/tests/unit/**/*.spec.{j,t}s?(x)"
        ],
        "env": {
          "jest": true
        }
      }
    ]
  },
  "browserslist": [
    "> 1%",
    "last 2 versions",
    "not dead"
  ],
  "jest": {
    "preset": "@vue/cli-plugin-unit-jest"
  }
}
